modName: Categorized Favorites Menu CFM - Archer Alchemist
summary: An attempt to make Alchemist-Archer Categorized Favorites Menu Setup by Phiro work with new current CFM
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange]REQUIRES[/color] [b][SIZE=4]::[/SIZE][/b] [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/URL]

[B]FEATURES:[/B]
[LIST][*] Sublist Arrows supports ACE arrows
[*] Sublist Bows supports ACE bows
[*] [b]File name discipline[/b]: Readme file wont over-wright other Readme\'s from mods that neglect to choose a naming convention that helps identify what mod the Readme belongs to. >=|
[*] Now works with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2730]Better Sorting[/url], mostly.
[*] CFG file formated for easier navigation[/LIST]

[B]DESCRIPTION:[/B]
An attempt to make [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6392]Alchemist-Archer Categorized Favorites Menu Setup[/URL], by Phiro, work with new current CFM.

I am mainly uploading this to prevent me accidentally losing it. And someone wanted a more up to date version of the one made by Phiro.

[B]INSTALLATION:[/B]
1) Download and install CFM
2) Download and install my files
3) Install using NMM
[LIST][*] If manual: Drag and drop the [b]Data folder[/b] into your [b]Skyrim folder[/b].[/LIST]

[B]UNINSTALL:[/B]
1) Remove via NMM

[B]Additional Thoughts[/b]
- [s]There may be some issues with Better Sorting. I may get to that later.[/s]

[b]Update Log:[/b]

- [B]V3[/b] -
[List][*] Placed the .CFG files in the proper folder [b]/data/interface/[/b], instead of [b]/data/[/b]
[*] Created two versions, one for screen resolution 1920x1080, and one for 1280x720 as per requested. I basically just made sure its centered on both res.[/list]
